summary.title: Linear Algebra for Machine Learning
summary.short_description: Matrix operations, eigenvalues, and applications to ML.
summary.embedding_text: MATH001: Linear Algebra for Machine Learning | Department: Mathematics | Level: intermediate | Matrix operations, eigenvalues, and applications to ML. | Topics: linear algebra, matrices, machine learning, mathematics

details.title: Linear Algebra for Machine Learning
details.full_description: Matrix operations, eigenvalues, and applications to machine learning. This course provides the mathematical foundation for understanding machine learning algorithms. Topics include vector spaces, matrix decompositions, eigenvalues, and optimization. Students will see how these concepts apply to PCA, SVD, and neural networks.
learning_objectives: Understand core concepts in linear algebra for machine learning
Implement linear algebra for machine learning algorithms and techniques
Apply linear algebra for machine learning to real-world problems
Analyze and evaluate linear algebra for machine learning solutions
Design and build complete mathematics systems
Apply vectors and vector spaces concepts
Implement vectors and vector spaces solutions
Apply least squares and regression concepts
Implement least squares and regression solutions
Apply applications to neural networks concepts
Implement applications to neural networks solutions

assignments.title: Midterm Exam
assignments.description: Comprehensive exam covering first half of course

assignments.title: Final Project
assignments.description: Complete project with code, report, and presentation

summary.title: Machine Learning Fundamentals
summary.short_description: Introduction to machine learning algorithms and applications.
summary.embedding_text: CS002: Machine Learning Fundamentals | Department: Computer Science | Level: advanced | Introduction to machine learning algorithms and applications. | Topics: machine learning, ai, python, neural networks

details.title: Machine Learning Fundamentals
details.full_description: Introduction to machine learning algorithms and applications. This course covers supervised and unsupervised learning, neural networks, and deep learning. Students will learn to implement ML algorithms from scratch and use popular frameworks like scikit-learn and TensorFlow. The course emphasizes both theoretical foundations and practical applications.
learning_objectives: Understand core concepts in machine learning fundamentals
Implement machine learning fundamentals algorithms and techniques
Apply machine learning fundamentals to real-world problems
Analyze and evaluate machine learning fundamentals solutions
Design and build complete computer science systems

summary.title: Computer Vision
summary.short_description: Image processing, object detection, and visual recognition systems.
summary.embedding_text: CS004: Computer Vision | Department: Computer Science | Level: advanced | Image processing, object detection, and visual recognition systems. | Topics: computer vision, image processing, object detection, cnn

details.title: Computer Vision
details.full_description: Image processing, object detection, and visual recognition systems. This course teaches students how to build systems that can see and understand visual data. Topics include image processing, feature extraction, object detection, and semantic segmentation. Students will use OpenCV, PyTorch, and TensorFlow.
learning_objectives: Understand core concepts in computer vision
Implement computer vision algorithms and techniques
Apply computer vision to real-world problems
Analyze and evaluate computer vision solutions
Design and build complete computer science systems
Apply introduction to computer vision concepts
Implement introduction to computer vision solutions
Apply feature detection and extraction concepts

Apply image classification with cnns concepts
Implement image classification with cnns solutions
Apply optical flow and tracking concepts
Implement optical flow and tracking solutions
Apply 3d vision and depth estimation concepts
Implement 3d vision and depth estimation solutions

summary.short_description: Advanced neural network architectures and deep learning techniques.
summary.embedding_text: CS006: Deep Learning and Neural Networks | Department: Computer Science | Level: graduate | Advanced neural network architectures and deep learning techniques. | Topics: deep learning, neural networks, transformers, computer vision

details.title: Deep Learning and Neural Networks
details.full_description: Advanced neural network architectures and deep learning techniques. This course dives deep into modern deep learning, covering CNNs, RNNs, transformers, and GANs. Students will implement state-of-the-art models and work on real-world projects. Prerequisites include linear algebra, calculus, and programming experience.
learning_objectives: Understand core concepts in deep learning and neural networks
Implement deep learning and neural networks algorithms and techniques
Apply deep learning and neural networks to real-world problems
Analyze and evaluate deep learning and neural networks solutions
Design and build complete computer science systems
Apply advanced cnn architectures (resnet, vgg) concepts
Implement advanced cnn architectures (resnet, vgg) solutions
Apply lstm and gru networks concepts
Implement lstm and gru networks solutions
Apply bert and gpt models concepts
Implement bert and gpt models solutions
Apply transfer learning and fine-tuning concepts
Implement transfer learning and fine-tuning solutions
Apply model optimization and deployment concepts
Implement model optimization and deployment solutions

details.title: Natural Language Processing
details.full_description: Processing and understanding human language with machine learning. This course covers text processing, language models, sentiment analysis, and modern NLP techniques. Students will work with transformers, BERT, and GPT models. Projects include building chatbots, text classifiers, and language generation systems.

details.title: Machine Learning Fundamentals
details.full_description: Introduction to machine learning algorithms and applications. This course covers supervised and unsupervised learning, neural networks, and deep learning. Students will learn to implement ML algorithms from scratch and use popular frameworks like scikit-learn and TensorFlow. The course emphasizes both theoretical foundations and practical applications.
learning_objectives: Understand core concepts in machine learning fundamentals
Implement machine learning fundamentals algorithms and techniques

Analyze and evaluate machine learning fundamentals solutions

summary.title: Linear Algebra for Machine Learning
summary.short_description: Matrix operations, eigenvalues, and applications to ML.
summary.embedding_text: MATH045: Linear Algebra for Machine Learning | Department: Mathematics | Level: intermediate | Matrix operations, eigenvalues, and applications to ML. | Topics: linear algebra, matrices, machine learning, mathematics

details.title: Linear Algebra for Machine Learning
details.full_description: Matrix operations, eigenvalues, and applications to machine learning. This course provides the mathematical foundation for understanding machine learning algorithms. Topics include vector spaces, matrix decompositions, eigenvalues, and optimization. Students will see how these concepts apply to PCA, SVD, and neural networks.
learning_objectives: Understand core concepts in linear algebra for machine learning
Implement linear algebra for machine learning algorithms and techniques
